author: Special Correspondent
text:
Madurai Corporation councillor Vijayaraghavan (47) was hacked to death at Munichalai on Sunday night.

Representing ward number 51 of the Corporation, Vijayaraghavan was also the ward secretary of AIADMK.

Police said that Vijayaraghavan was sitting with two others in front of an electrical shop when an armed gang hacked him. He suffered multiple injuries on his head. He was rushed to a private hospital from where he was referred to the Government Rajaji Hospital. He died enroute.

Commissioner of Police Shailesh Kumar Yadav said the murder was a result of personal rivalry.
title: Councillor murdered in Madurai
